title: The new-yeeres gift presented at court, from the lady Parvula to the Lord Minimus, (commonly called Little Jefferie) Her Majesties servant, with a letter as it was penned in short-hand: wherein is proved little things are better then great. Written by Microphilus.
author: Slater, Master.
publisher: By N. and I. Okes, dwelling in Little St. Bartholmewes,
